sentences.en: Alain Prost finished third and virtually conceded the world championship.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·普罗斯特以第三名的成绩结束比赛，实际上已经将世界冠军的位置拱手让人。

sentences.en: England intend fielding their strongest team in next month's World Youth Championship.
sentences.cn: 英格兰意欲在下月的世界青年锦标赛中推出他们的最强阵容。
希腊队赢得了欧洲锦标赛的冠军。

sentences.en: He finished second in the championship four years in a row.
sentences.cn: 他连续4年获得锦标赛亚军。

sentences.en: He went on to take the championship.
In showing contempt for the heavyweight championship Douglas offended a stern code.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯藐视重量级拳王称号的行为违背了严格的准则。

sentences.en: It's a Championship fight — do your best.
Scotland were ahead in their European championship qualifier in Iceland.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在冰岛举行的欧洲杯预选赛中处于领先位置。

sentences.en: Selling tickets for a devalued championship is becoming increasingly difficult.
sentences.cn: 含金量打了折扣的锦标赛的门票变得越来越难卖。

sentences.en: The championship result was almost a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 锦标赛的结果差不多在意料之中。

sentences.en: The team won the divisional championship.
The win revived glorious memories of his championship-winning days.
sentences.cn: 这次胜利勾起了他对往昔那些夺冠岁月的美好回忆。

sentences.en: The world drivers' championship leader crossed the line ahead of the Swede.
sentences.cn: 在世界车手锦标赛上，领先选手比瑞典人快一步冲线。

sentences.en: They had their championship hopes dashed by a 3-1 defeat.
sentences.cn: 遭遇1比3的失利后，他们的冠军梦就此破灭。

sentences.en: They took an invincible lead in the chase for the championship.
sentences.cn: 他们在冠军争夺赛中居于不可动摇的领先地位。

sentences.en: This year'snational college football championship was won by Princeton.
sentences.cn: 今年全国高校橄榄球锦标赛的冠军是普林斯顿队。

words.tran_cn: 锦标赛；冠军称号；冠军的地位

trans.tran_en: a competition to find which player, team etc is the best in a particular sport
